description:
Quicktionary: (n) A quick, convenient, off-line dictionary.  Also, a portmanteau of "Quick" and "Dictionary".

Quicktionary runs completely offline and give's lightning-fast word look-ups on a database of over 140,000 words. 

No network access is required to run this dictionary.

Features 'RandomWord' - a fun button to learn new words.

Also provides a list of possible word choices as you type characters into the search box.

And most words within the definitions are also links to the definitions of those words.  Just tap the words and definitions appear without delay.  Great for writers, scrabble players, and anyone who likes learning and verifying.
